headline: Valero Energy (VLO) Stock Dips While Market Gains: Key Facts

headline: Stocks Rally on Hopes of De-Escalation of Hostilities in the Middle East

headline: ‘Cannot do business in the state of California’: Gas prices could hit $8/gallon as two refineries shut down
summary: California can’t afford to lose one refinery, let alone two, a USC professor says.
